verses.verse: וּבִ֨נְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> Now Benjamin הוֹלִ֖יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֶּ֣לַע <S%H1106><s%> Bela בְּכֹר֑וֹ <S%H1060><s%> his firstborn אַשְׁבֵּל֙ <S%H788><s%> Ashbel הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> the second וְאַחְרַ֖ח <S%H315><s%> and Aharah הַשְּׁלִישִֽׁי׃ <S%H7992><s%> the third
נוֹחָה֙ <S%H5119><s%> Nohah הָֽרְבִיעִ֔י <S%H7243><s%> the fourth וְרָפָ֖א <S%H7498><s%> and Rapha הַחֲמִישִֽׁי׃ <S%H2549><s%> the fifth ס
וַיִּהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> had בָנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> And the sons לְבָ֑לַע <S%H1106><s%> of Bela אַדָּ֥ר <S%H146><s%> were Addar וְגֵרָ֖א <S%H1617><s%> and Gera וַאֲבִיהֽוּד׃ <S%H31><s%> and Abihud
וַאֲבִישׁ֥וּעַ <S%H50><s%> And Abishua וְנַעֲמָ֖ן <S%H5283><s%> and Naaman וַאֲחֽוֹחַ׃ <S%H265><s%> and Ahoah
וְגֵרָ֥א <S%H1617><s%> And Gera וּשְׁפוּפָ֖ן <S%H8197><s%> and Shephuphan וְחוּרָֽם׃ <S%H2361><s%> and Huram

וְאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And these [are] the sons אֵח֑וּד <S%H261><s%> of Ehud אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these הֵ֞ם <S%H1992><s%> like רָאשֵׁ֤י <S%H7218><s%> these are the heads אָבוֹת֙ <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לְי֣וֹשְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> of the inhabitants גֶ֔בַע <S%H1387><s%> of Geba וַיַּגְל֖וּם <S%H1540><s%> and they removed אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מָנָֽחַת׃ <S%H4506><s%> them to Manahath

וְנַעֲמָ֧ן <S%H5283><s%> And Naaman וַאֲחִיָּ֛ה <S%H281><s%> and Ahiah וְגֵרָ֖א <S%H1617><s%> and Gera ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הֶגְלָ֑ם <S%H1540><s%> he removed וְהוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> them and begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֻזָּ֖א <S%H5798><s%> Uzza וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחִיחֻֽד׃ <S%H284><s%> and Ahihud

וְשַׁחֲרַ֗יִם <S%H7842><s%> And Shaharaim הוֹלִיד֙ <S%H3205><s%> begat בִּשְׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> [children] in the country מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> after שִׁלְח֖וֹ <S%H7971><s%> he had sent them away אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> חוּשִׁ֥ים <S%H2366><s%> Hushim וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> בַּעֲרָ֖א <S%H1199><s%> and Baara נָשָֽׁיו׃ <S%H802><s%> [were] his wives

וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> And he begat מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> By חֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2321><s%> of Hodesh אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹבָב֙ <S%H3103><s%> Jobab וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צִבְיָ֔א <S%H6644><s%> and Zibia וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֵישָׁ֖א <S%H4331><s%> and Mesha וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַלְכָּֽם׃ <S%H4445><s%> and Malcham

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְע֥וּץ <S%H3263><s%> And Jeuz וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָֽׂכְיָ֖ה <S%H7634><s%> and Shachia וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִרְמָ֑ה <S%H4821><s%> and Mirma אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בָנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> These [were] his sons רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> heads אָבֽוֹת׃ <S%H1><s%> of the fathers
וּמֵחֻשִׁ֛ים <S%H2366><s%> And of Hushim הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> he begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִיט֖וּב <S%H36><s%> Abitub וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶלְפָּֽעַל׃ <S%H508><s%> and Elpaal

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons אֶלְפַּ֔עַל <S%H508><s%> of Elpaal עֵ֥בֶר <S%H5677><s%> Eber וּמִשְׁעָ֖ם <S%H4936><s%> and Misham וָשָׁ֑מֶד <S%H8106><s%> and Shamed ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> who בָּנָ֣ה <S%H1129><s%> who built אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אוֹנ֔וֹ <S%H207><s%> Ono וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֹ֖ד <S%H3850><s%> and Lod וּבְנֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H1323><s%> with the towns

וּבְרִעָ֣ה <S%H1283><s%> Beriah וָשֶׁ֔מַע <S%H8087><s%> also and Shema הֵ֚מָּה <S%H1992><s%> who רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> [were] heads הָאָב֔וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לְיוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> of the inhabitants אַיָּל֑וֹן <S%H357><s%> of Aijalon הֵ֥מָּה <S%H1992><s%> who הִבְרִ֖יחוּ <S%H1272><s%> who drove away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> י֥וֹשְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants גַֽת׃ <S%H1661><s%> of Gath
וְאַחְי֥וֹ <S%H283><s%> And Ahio שָׁשָׁ֖ק <S%H8349><s%> Shashak וִירֵמֽוֹת׃ <S%H3406><s%> and Jeremoth
וּזְבַדְיָ֥ה <S%H2069><s%> And Zebadiah וַעֲרָ֖ד <S%H6166><s%> and Arad וָעָֽדֶר׃ <S%H5738><s%> and Ader
וּמִיכָאֵ֧ל <S%H4317><s%> And Michael וְיִשְׁפָּ֛ה <S%H3472><s%> and Ispah וְיוֹחָ֖א <S%H3109><s%> and Joha בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons בְרִיעָֽה׃ <S%H1283><s%> of Beriah
וּזְבַדְיָ֥ה <S%H2069><s%> And Zebadiah וּמְשֻׁלָּ֖ם <S%H4918><s%> and Meshullam וְחִזְקִ֥י <S%H2395><s%> and Hezeki וָחָֽבֶר׃ <S%H2268><s%> and Heber
וְיִשְׁמְרַ֧י <S%H3461><s%> Ishmerai וְיִזְלִיאָ֛ה <S%H3152><s%> also and Jezliah וְיוֹבָ֖ב <S%H3103><s%> and Jobab בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons אֶלְפָּֽעַל׃ <S%H508><s%> of Elpaal
וְיָקִ֥ים <S%H3356><s%> And Jakim וְזִכְרִ֖י <S%H2147><s%> and Zichri וְזַבְדִּֽי׃ <S%H2067><s%> and Zabdi
וֶאֱלִיעֵנַ֥י <S%H462><s%> And Elienai וְצִלְּתַ֖י <S%H6769><s%> and Zilthai וֶאֱלִיאֵֽל׃ <S%H447><s%> and Eliel
וַעֲדָיָ֧ה <S%H5718><s%> And Adaiah וּבְרָאיָ֛ה <S%H1256><s%> and Beraiah וְשִׁמְרָ֖ת <S%H8119><s%> and Shimrath בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons שִׁמְעִֽי׃ <S%H8096><s%> of Shimhi
וְיִשְׁפָּ֥ן <S%H3473><s%> And Ishpan וָעֵ֖בֶר <S%H5677><s%> and Heber וֶאֱלִיאֵֽל׃ <S%H447><s%> and Eliel
וְעַבְדּ֥וֹן <S%H5658><s%> And Abdon וְזִכְרִ֖י <S%H2147><s%> and Zichri וְחָנָֽן׃ <S%H2605><s%> and Hanan
וַחֲנַנְיָ֥ה <S%H2608><s%> And Hananiah וְעֵילָ֖ם <S%H5867><s%> and Elam וְעַנְתֹתִיָּֽה׃ <S%H6070><s%> and Antothijah
וְיִפְדְיָ֥ה <S%H3301><s%> And Iphedeiah [וּפְנִיאֵל כ] (וּפְנוּאֵ֖ל <S%H6439><s%> Peniel ק) בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons שָׁשָֽׁק׃ <S%H8349><s%> of Shashak
וְשַׁמְשְׁרַ֥י <S%H8125><s%> And Shamsherai וּשְׁחַרְיָ֖ה <S%H7841><s%> and Shehariah וַעֲתַלְיָֽה׃ <S%H6271><s%> and Athaliah
וְיַעֲרֶשְׁיָ֧ה <S%H3298><s%> And Jaresiah וְאֵלִיָּ֛ה <S%H452><s%> and Eliah וְזִכְרִ֖י <S%H2147><s%> and Zichri בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons יְרֹחָֽם׃ <S%H3395><s%> of Jeroham

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> These [were] heads אָב֛וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לְתֹלְדוֹתָ֖ם <S%H8435><s%> by their generations רָאשִׁ֑ים <S%H7218><s%> chief אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> who יָשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> [men] These dwelt בִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem ס

וּבְגִבְע֥וֹן <S%H1391><s%> And at Gibeon יָשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> dwelt אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> the father גִבְע֑וֹן <S%H1391><s%> of Gibeon וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H802><s%> whose wife's מַעֲכָֽה׃ <S%H4601><s%> [was] Maachah

וּבְנ֥וֹ <S%H1121><s%> son הַבְּכ֖וֹר <S%H1060><s%> And his firstborn עַבְדּ֑וֹן <S%H5658><s%> Abdon וְצ֥וּר <S%H6698><s%> and Zur וְקִ֖ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> and Kish וּבַ֥עַל <S%H1168><s%> and Baal וְנָדָֽב׃ <S%H5070><s%> and Nadab
וּגְד֥וֹר <S%H1446><s%> And Gedor וְאַחְי֖וֹ <S%H283><s%> and Ahio וָזָֽכֶר׃ <S%H2144><s%> and Zacher

וּמִקְל֖וֹת <S%H4732><s%> And Mikloth הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שִׁמְאָ֑ה <S%H8039><s%> Shimeah וְאַף־ <S%H637><s%> And these also הֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like נֶ֧גֶד <S%H5048><s%> over against them אֲחֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H251><s%> with their brethren יָשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> dwelt בִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲחֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H251><s%> their relatives ס

וְנֵר֙ <S%H5369><s%> And Ner הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קִ֔ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> Kish וְקִ֖ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> and Kish הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul וְשָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> and Saul הוֹלִ֤יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהֽוֹנָתָן֙ <S%H3083><s%> Jonathan וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַלְכִּי־ שׁ֔וּעַ <S%H4444><s%> and Malchishua וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִֽינָדָ֖ב <S%H41><s%> and Abinadab וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶשְׁבָּֽעַל׃ <S%H792><s%> and Eshbaal

וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> And the son יְהוֹנָתָ֖ן <S%H3083><s%> of Jonathan מְרִ֣יב בָּ֑עַל <S%H4807><s%> [was] Meribbaal וּמְרִ֥יב בַּ֖עַל <S%H4807><s%> and Meribbaal הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִיכָֽה׃ <S%H4318><s%> Micah ס

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons מִיכָ֑ה <S%H4318><s%> of Micah פִּית֥וֹן <S%H6377><s%> [were] Pithon וָמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4429><s%> and Melech וְתַאְרֵ֥עַ <S%H8390><s%> and Tarea וְאָחָֽז׃ <S%H271><s%> and Ahaz

וְאָחָז֙ <S%H271><s%> And Ahaz הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוֹעַדָּ֔ה <S%H3085><s%> Jehoadah וִיהֽוֹעַדָּ֗ה <S%H3085><s%> and Jehoadah הוֹלִ֛יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָלֶ֥מֶת <S%H5964><s%> Alemeth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַזְמָ֖וֶת <S%H5820><s%> and Azmaveth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זִמְרִ֑י <S%H2174><s%> and Zimri וְזִמְרִ֖י <S%H2174><s%> and Zimri הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מוֹצָֽא׃ <S%H4162><s%> Moza

וּמוֹצָ֖א <S%H4162><s%> And Moza הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּנְעָ֑א <S%H1150><s%> Binea רָפָ֥ה <S%H7498><s%> Rapha בְנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> [was] his son אֶלְעָשָׂ֥ה <S%H501><s%> Eleasah בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son אָצֵ֥ל <S%H682><s%> Azel בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son

וּלְאָצֵל֮ <S%H682><s%> And Azel שִׁשָּׁ֣ה <S%H8337><s%> had six בָנִים֒ <S%H1121><s%> sons וְאֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> and these שְׁמוֹתָ֗ם <S%H8034><s%> whose names עַזְרִיקָ֥ם ׀ <S%H5840><s%> [are] these Azrikam בֹּ֙כְרוּ֙ <S%H1074><s%> Bocheru וְיִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <S%H3458><s%> and Ishmael וּשְׁעַרְיָ֔ה <S%H8187><s%> and Sheariah וְעֹבַדְיָ֖ה <S%H5662><s%> and Obadiah וְחָנָ֑ן <S%H2605><s%> and Hanan כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> All these [were] the sons אָצַֽל׃ <S%H682><s%> of Azel

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons עֵ֣שֶׁק <S%H6232><s%> of Eshek אָחִ֑יו <S%H251><s%> his brother אוּלָ֣ם <S%H198><s%> [were] Ulam בְּכֹר֔וֹ <S%H1060><s%> his firstborn יְעוּשׁ֙ <S%H3266><s%> Jehush הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> the second וֶֽאֱלִיפֶ֖לֶט <S%H467><s%> and Eliphelet הַשְּׁלִשִֽׁי׃ <S%H7992><s%> the third

וַֽיִּהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> of בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons א֠וּלָם <S%H198><s%> of Ulam אֲנָשִׁ֨ים <S%H582><s%> men גִּבֹּרֵי־ <S%H1368><s%> were mighty חַ֜יִל <S%H2428><s%> of valour דֹּ֣רְכֵי <S%H1869><s%> archer קֶ֗שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> arch וּמַרְבִּ֤ים <S%H7235><s%> and had many בָּנִים֙ <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and sons' בָנִ֔ים <S%H1121><s%> sons מֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁ֑ים <S%H2572><s%> and fifty כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> All these [are] of the sons בִנְיָמִֽן׃ <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin פ
